input: To confirm your registration, please click the link sent to your email. If you did not receive the email, check your spam folder. Contact support if you need further assistance.
output:
Confirmation of your registration requires clicking on the link that was sent to your email address.

If you do not find it in your inbox, be sure to check your spam folder.

In case it doesn't appear there either or if you encounter any issues with sending emails, please contact our support team for assistance.
complianceText:

tag. 2. The output should have at least three

tags. 3. Each

tag should include one tag. 4. Each

tag should include multiple tags to emphasize key words and phrases. Let's evaluate the output against these requirements: - There are three

tags in the given output, which meets the requirement of having at least three

tags. - The first

tag includes one tag and one tag. - The second

tag does not include any tag, which violates the description requirement of having one tag inside each

tag. - The second

tag includes one tag. - The third

tag includes one tag and does not have multiple tags, only one. There are violations in the output: 1. The second

tag does not have a tag. 2. Not all

tags have multiple tags. Considering these violations, the output does not completely comply with the description provided. ERR
